item.description:
Ever wanted to get a long, lean body like a ballet dancer? Now is your chance to train with Sheila and add some lean muscle - perfect to pair with some of her killer-cardio classes!

From 6:30 - 7:30 pm, Sheila is running 4 weeks of classes - 8 total - on Tuesday and Thursday evenings from the Putnam Village Clubhouse. You just may see a couple of our group's cyclists there practicing their best leaps and turns :-)

Contact Sheila directly, 508.543.5276, for more information. The payment, $5.50/per class or $44 total, is payable directly to Sheila.

So drop by a class or set free your inner ballerina -- tutus are optional!
item.name: Balletone & Sculpt with weights - Foxboro
